Package tripleplay.game.trans

Class Summary
AbstractTransition<T extends AbstractTransition<T>> A base class for transitions that handles duration and the PITA machinery to case return values to the right type.
FadeTransition Fades the new screen in front of the old one.
FlipTransition Flips the current screen over, revealing the new screen as if it were on the reverse side of the current screen.
InterpedTransition<T extends InterpedTransition<T>> Handles shared code for transitions that use an interpolation.
PageTurnTransition Opens the current screen like the page of a book, revealing the new screen beneath.
SlideTransition Slides the old screen off, and the new screen on right behind.
